name: Stumblehill
description: Stumblehill is a platformer where you control a clumsy penguin, Ecki, on their quest to reach the top of a mountain. Guide Ecki through various beautiful environments, such as lush woods, sunlit meadows and dark caverns as they try to reach their goal. Ecki may fall over and stumble, adding an extra layer of trickiness to mastering the game, but allowing for impressive feats such as somersaults! This way the game adds an interesting twist to the otherwise classic platforming.
